entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
